attributes.action: Formally recognise Esperanto as an international language.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the PM to encourage the use of Esperanto as a truly international language.  Introduce it's use in education from nursery school age through to university level. To support it's use as an international means of communication as being of equal, or more value than any one country's language as a means on promoting world harmony and peace through enabling communications for all world citizens
